parameters.label: Use Raster Mode
parameters.name: useRasterMode
parameters.descr: Directs the algorithm to simply scan the correlation window in raster fashion instead of centering on features.

parameters.label: Raster Mode Correlation Window Step Interval
parameters.name: corrStepSize
parameters.descr: When useRasterMode=true, this parameter sets the distance in pixels between adjacent correlation window centers. If absent or zero, defaults to corrWindowSize.

parameters.label: Peak Threshold
parameters.name: peakThreshold
parameters.descr: The minimum cross-correlation value acceptable for a match.

parameters.label: Min Feature Strength
parameters.name: minFeatureStrength
parameters.descr: OpenCV minimum strength (quality) value for accepting features.

parameters.label: Correlation Method
parameters.name: correlationMethod
parameters.descr: OpenCV correlation method to use for template matching: 0=SQDIFF, 1=SQDIFF NORMED, 2=TM CCORR, 3=TM CCORR NORMED, 4=TM COEFF, 5=TM COEFF NORMED

parameters.label: Resampling Method
parameters.name: resamplingMethod
parameters.descr: Selects the type of resampler to use for reprojection. Can be

parameters.label: Use Harris Corner Detector
parameters.name: useHarrisCorner
parameters.descr: Instructs OpenCV to use the Harris corner detector for locating features.
